website_summaries.verdict: Combines the graphics of Monopoly with faster play that's fun for all ages. The best pick for family game night.
pros: A fast-paced game that's based on owning favorite brands instead of properties
About half the price of other versions
cons: The rules are very different from original Monopoly, but it's still a lot of fun to play

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a quicker, updated monopoly. Doesn't take anywhere near as long as the original game and is a lot of fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a fun quick game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and it’s a shame it’s being retired. This is a quick game of monopoly to play with the family!!😋
customer_reviews.author: Lena Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Transformers game piece!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s Monopoly with unique pieces and details. Gave it as a gift and our friend loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Public name 337

customer_reviews.title: Even younger sister 10 able to get rules and play this version of Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: We love Amazon ! My daughter had an injury the first day of summer and this game was s present from her big sister. It arrived so fast . She smiled ear to ear. Playing took her mind off the pain for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Family

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to play!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! Good price and arrived on time as promised delivery date.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this game. Shorter version of monopoly. Keeps their interest. They are 13 /14 years old.

product_meta.title: Hasbro Gaming Monopoly Empire Board Game
product_meta.description:
In the Monopoly Empire game, players can own the world's top brands. After choosing one of the uniquely branded tokens, players move around the board, and start building their empires. The game is a race to the top as players buy their favorite brands one by one and fill their towers. Players can own famous brands, including Nerf, Transformers, Levi's, and more. Opponents collect rent from their rivals; the higher their tower, the more they can charge! For two to four players, the first player to fill their tower with billboards wins! The Hasbro Gaming, Transformers, Nerf, and Monopoly names and logos, the distinctive design of the gameboard, the four corner squares, the Mr. Monopoly name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of the board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro for its property trading game and game equipment.

SET CONTAINS:
Includes gameboard, 4 towers, 6 tokens, 30 billboard tiles, 6 office tiles, 14 Chance cards, 14 Empire cards, money pack, 2 dice, and game guide.
feature_bullets: Players own their favorite brands, including Puma, Levi's, Nerf, and more
Tokens and game pieces are based on the world's favorite brands
